info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 12 at 12:36PM CDT until June 12 at 1:15PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN LIPSCOMB...NORTHERN WHEELER...NORTHEASTERN GRAY... SOUTHEASTERN ROBERTS AND HEMPHILL COUNTIES... At 1235 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 11 miles northwest of Lora to 7 miles south of Miami, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Canadian, Miami, Briscoe, Higgins, New Mobeetie, Lora, Allison, Glazier, Lake Marvin and Mobeetie. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
